name: livin green
description:
this game was made as part of the Teesside game design where me and 4 great classmates work together to make a game in 1 week

Katie is the new employee of the livin green plant shop and her job is to take care of and water all the plants to keep them healthy and fresh when the store opens

controls are WASD to move and E to water the plants

if you run out of water go to the counter to restock

and most importantly have fun

(PS)I'm aware of the black circle just pretend its not there
